hymn.title: But Flee Youthful Lusts
hymn.chords: | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Dm - | C/G G7 C - | C - Em - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F - G7 - | C - Em - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | F G7 C - ||

layout.singingstanza: If there -- fore an -- y -- one cleans -- es him -- self from these, he will be a ves -- sel un -- to hon -- or sanc -- ti -- fied, use -- ful to the mas -- ter, pre -- pared un -- to ev -- ery good work, un -- to ev -- ery good work. A ves -- sel un -- to hon -- or, sanc -- ti -- fied, use -- ful to the mas -- ter. But flee youth -- ful lusts, and pur -- sue righ -- teous -- ness, faith, love, peace with those who call on the Lord out of a pure heart. But flee youth -- ful lusts, and pur -- sue righ -- teous -- ness, faith, love, peace with those who call, call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

lyrics.stanza: If therefore anyone cleanses himself from these, He will be a vessel unto honor sanctified, Useful to the master, Prepared unto every good work, unto every good work. A vessel unto honor, sanctified, useful to the master.
But flee youthful lusts, and pursue righteousness, Faith, love, peace with those who Call on the Lord out of a pure heart.
But flee youthful lusts, and pursue Righteousness, faith, love, peace with Those who call, call on the Lord Out of a pure heart.
